pullrequest.title: Add joint properties to property panel

content.raw:
Oh yes, I forgot about them. I was wondering if they come through messages automatically, if we need to ask for the messages, or if they're calculated afterwards somehow.

There's a [jointTopic](#!/osrf/gzweb/src/b91d235d3da25e973c9a891acb39522cdfa409f2/gzbridge/GazeboInterface.cc?at=default#cl-561) on `GazeboInterface.cc` but it doesn't seem to receive any messages.
content.html:
Oh yes, I forgot about them. I was wondering if they come through messages automatically, if we need to ask for the messages, or if they're calculated afterwards somehow.

There's a jointTopic on GazeboInterface.cc but it doesn't seem to receive any messages.
